Title: Tokyo Godfathers
Writer: Satoshi Kon (screenplay), Satoshi Kon (story), Keiko Nobumoto (screenplay)
Actors: Tôru Emori, Aya Okamoto, Yoshiaki Umegaki, Shôzô Îzuka
Plot: Christmas in Tokyo, Japan. Three homeless friends: a young girl, a transvestite, and a middle-aged bum. While foraging through some trash, they find an abandoned newborn. Hana, the transvestite with delusions of being a mother, convinces the others to keep it overnight. The next day, using a key found with the baby, they start tracking down the parents, with many adventures along the way.
